rules_text:
When Traversing the Hellwastes enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Scout creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“No one's come back alive? That just means whatever's in there is still ours for the taking.”[/i]
